context: Globant operates with more than 29,000 employees across 33 countries, with most developers in Latin America following a nearshore model ensuring minimum 4-hour time zone overlap. The company specializes in digital transformation with strong focus on AI solutions including AI-powered tools, agents, and platforms for enhancing productivity. Other specializations include cloud computing, data analytics, digital consulting, and blockchain. Globant ranks 36th amongst 100,489 active competitors and 8th in total funding. IT outsourcing is expected to grow with a CAGR of 6.51% from 2025 to 2030.
